message: . Hi. When I attack Trump, and I do it frequently and on many fronts, most of the responses I get from conservatives are insults, memes, or dismissive posts like the one you just sent. I always tell the insulters that they are showing their true colors and limitations if they can't engage and defend their own positions instead of just dismissing mine. I ALSO often imply that this lack is a conservative problem, not widely shared by my liberal cohorts. Are you going to provide evidence that I am wrong, right out of the box? At least you didn't do any name-calling.

So my initial reaction to your comment was to disagree because I was thinking the story is how this black officer did his job despite the hate that was directed at his race by the man he helped, but as I thought about it I'm absolutely positive that most white police officers would do the same for an elderly black panther and the media would not report it. So, I believe that this report is a carefully contrived attempt to make it appear that blacks are not racist and whites are. What is dispicable is how the hidden divisive media uses an act of kindness to divide this nation further apart.
